## Description

{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

## Effects

{{#var:effects_formatted}}

## Wild Surge effects

* Positive effects:
** +5 Cipher [Power Level](/powerLevel/) for 3.0 sec
** Echo spell cast (cast twice)
** +999 [Focus](/focus/) (set [Focus](/focus/) to full)
** Push target 3m
** Apply random [Affliction](/statusEffectsDeadfireAffliction/) to target: [Blinded](/statusEffectsDeadfireBlinded/), Status effects (Deadfire)#Dominated|Dominated]], [Enfeebled](/statusEffectsDeadfireEnfeebled/), [Paralyzed](/statusEffectsDeadfireParalyzed/), [Stunned](/statusEffectsDeadfireStunned/), [Terrified](/statusEffectsDeadfireTerrified/)
** Add Empower point
* Negative effects:
** -3 Cipher [Power Level](/powerLevel/) for 3.0 sec
** Miscast: Self AoE (2.5m radius) Deals 1.5x accrued [Focus](/focus/) as [Shock](/shock/) Damage, 7 Penetration. Target also takes damage
** Set target enemy Invisible for 15 seconds
** Apply random [Inspiration](/statusEffectsDeadfireInspirations/) to target: [Brilliant](/statusEffectsDeadfireBrilliant/), [Courageous](/statusEffectsDeadfireCourageous/), [Energized](/statusEffectsDeadfireEnergized/), [Intuitive](/statusEffectsDeadfireIntuitive/), [Robust](/statusEffectsDeadfireRobust/), [Swift](/statusEffectsDeadfireSwift/)
** Remove Empower point

## Notes

* Unique to the [Wild Mind](/wildMind/) [Cipher](/cipher/) subclass ([Serafen](/serafen/)).
